item.title: PQ240408D2-04a Looking for Taiwan Creators on YouTube for Online Focus Group Discussion - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for Taiwanese creators on YouTube to participate in an online focus group discussion.

Respondents should be:
- Monetizing creators on YouTube
- 500+ subscribers on YouTube
- Must want to make money / grow their business from being a Creator
- All Creator’s YT channel needs to be verified
- Long Form, Short Form and Livestream Creators
- Mix of Age (18-44), Gender, Income
- At least high school education
- Employed or Full-Time Student
- Articulate

The online focus groups will be held tentatively from 10 to 12 July.

Respondent incentive per successful completion of online focus group: USD60

There will be a screening survey that respondents will need to complete to determine if they meet all criteria for the focus group discussion. Remuneration will only be made to those who meet the screening criteria and completed the online focus group successfully.

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 19, 2024 07:03 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Videography
Country: Singapore
click to apply

item.title: Looking for someone to make YouTube videos for popular channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

We run a YouTube channel about investment or passive income specifically on stock market and we’re looking for someone who can help make videos for our channel.

We would provide you with the video title and you would create a video around it.

This would consist of the following:

-Writing an original script
-Doing a voice over
-Finding clips to use
-Editing the video

The videos need to be at least 10-15 minutes long each.

We’re looking for someone to work with long term on this so if you’re interested let me know and I’ll send you some samples of the types of videos we’re looking for and you can let me know if you can do it.

Also, if you’ve ever worked on any YouTube videos, please attach samples of your work.

I look forward to hopefully working with you!



Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 06:55 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, YouTube, YouTube Development
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for VSL (Video Sales Letter) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced video editor to edit a VSL (Video Sales Letter) for our company.

The VSL should be engaging, persuasive, and visually appealing to capture and retain viewers' attention.

The editor will be responsible for combining raw footage, adding graphics and animations, optimizing audio, and ensuring smooth transitions to create a seamless final product.

This project requires strong storytelling skills, a keen eye for detail, and proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. The successful candidate must have a solid understanding of VSL editing techniques, including pacing, visual effects, and color grading.

    Skills required:
    - Video editing
    - Storytelling
    - Graphic design
    - Animation
    - Audio optimization

If you have a portfolio that showcases your previous work in editing VSLs or similar projects, please include it in your application. This is a great opportunity to work on an exciting project and collaborate with a talented marketing team.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 06:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.description:

Please send me your work examples, and if we will work together i will ask for a 10 second sample.

Price per video is 5$. I will start with 7 vids a week and upgoing to 14 vids a week.

item.title: Hiring Videographer for Interview Style Reel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled videographer to create an interview style reel for our project. The ideal candidate will have experience in capturing compelling interview footage and editing it into a professional-looking reel. The reel will feature interviews with our team members and will be used for promotional purposes.
  Responsibilities:
  - Conduct interviews with team members and capture high-quality footage
  - Edit the footage to create a visually appealing and engaging reel
  - Ensure proper lighting and sound quality during the interviews
  - Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and goals for the reel
  - Deliver the final edited reel within the agreed-upon timeframe
  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in videography techniques and equipment
  - Strong editing skills using video editing software
  - Excellent attention to detail and aesthetic sense
  - Ability to capture clear audio and video footage
  - Strong communication and collaboration skills
  This is a medium-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level videographer with a portfolio showcasing similar work. If you have the skills and expertise to create an impressive interview style reel, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $15.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 06:40 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: 3D Christmas Tree with Sparkle/Snow VFX for Christmas Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are a media and marketing firm working with a theme park company that is creating a Christmas Wonderland theme park in the Phoenix AZ area. We are currently working on a short promo piece for the park that involves Santa's elves bringing Christmas magic to the park. It culminates in them creating a Christmas tree made entirely out of sparkles and snow at night from a blizzard of snow. This is the part where we need VFX: to edit in this spiraling, shifting Christmas tree made of magic. The animation will consist of our two elves creating the sparkles, then those sparkles spiraling into the air to form the shape of a ~40ft Christmas tree in the center of a concrete pad.

Extra details:
- We have approximately seven video clips that involve VFX. It totals ~1 minute of raw footage. We'll provide these clips for your reference in upwork messages.
- There is some camera movement in each of the clips: camera tracking would need to be used to give the illusion that the Christmas tree is in the center of the pad.
- Some of the clips have actual artificial snow that we used in the shot. The shots we took with a drone do not have this, and will need to have snow added in post.
- For the final drone shot, our lights are visible in-frame. We would like to have these keyed out or otherwise hidden by the animation.

References:
- Sparkle and snow effects (see timestamps 1:11, 2:13, 2:34): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0MK7qz13bU&sttick=1
- Sparkles creating Christmas tree vfx (very beginning of video): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=acccAGWMtHU

Timeline: the finished video sequence would need to be completed within 2 weeks of contract start date. We would like be able to give creative input and see progress milestones along the way.

Questions to answer before contract acceptance:
- How many hours do you estimate this project would take?

Requirement: this needs to be created by you, not AI.

We are excited to get started on this project soon.

Budget: $700
Posted On: June 19, 2024 06:28 UTC
Category: Visual Effects
Skills:Match Moving, Adobe After Effects, 3D Animation, Visual Effects
Skills: Match Moving, Adobe After Effects, 3D Animation, Visual Effects
Country: United States
click to apply
